name: FileTest
description: Test suite for testing file-related functionalities provided by the BaseFaker class.

test_cases.name: testExtension
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of file extensions with specific allowed values.

test_cases.name: testMimeTypeFormat
test_cases.description: Tests the format of generated MIME types.

test_cases.name: testFileName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of file names with specific patterns.

test_cases.name: testFileNameSpecifyExtension
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of file names with a specified extension.

test_cases.name: testFileNameSpecifyDir
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of file names with a specified directory.

test_cases.name: testFileNameSpecifySeparator
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of file names with a specified separator.

test_cases.name: testFileNameSpecifyName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of file names with a specified name.
